Your studies have made you savvy in many areas, but one in particular drew your intense interest. Choose a methodology. The methodologies are as follows:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Alchemical Sciences Methodology]{Alchemical Sciences Methodology}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Empiricism Methodology]{Empiricism Methodology}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Forensic Medicine Methodology]{Forensic Medicine Methodology}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Interrogation Methodology]{Interrogation Methodology}
